job.title: Software Engineer - Twitch-Music
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongLaunched in 2011 Twitch is a global community that comes together each day to create multiplayer entertainment unique live unpredictable experiences created by the interactions of millions We bring the joy of coop to everything from casual gaming to worldclass esports to anime marathons music and art streams Twitch also hosts TwitchCon where we bring everyone together to celebrate learn and grow their personal interests and passions Were always live at Twitch Stay up to date on all things Twitch on LinkedIn  Twitter and on our Blog
